TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 302

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin and Anthony Winston, December 19, 1829. Austin agrees to grant lands to certain families which Winston will introduce. Winston agrees to pay fees. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 302

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin and Anthony Winston, December 19, 1829. Austin agrees to grant lands to certain families which Winston will introduce. Winston agrees to pay fees. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-19-1829">December 19, 1829*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
